extension.welcomeTitle.signIn:
Sign in to Fabric to get started with your Workspace.
[Sign in to Fabric](command:vscode-fabric.signIn)
extension.welcomeTitle.emptyWorkspace:
This workspace is empty. Create an item to get started with Microsoft Fabric.
[Create Fabric item](command:vscode-fabric.createArtifact)
extension.view.local.welcome: No local project exists for a Fabric item in explorer.
extension.configuration.ApiTimeout.descr: Number of milliseconds to allow for an API call before throwing a Timeout Error
extension.configuration.LocalFolderSaveB: Controls when to save local folder paths for items
extension.configuration.DebugLogging.des: Turn on debug logging in the Fabric Output Panel
extension.configuration.ShowFolders.desc: Display folders in the Fabric Workspace view
extension.walkthrough.fabric.title: Get Started with Microsoft Fabric
extension.walkthrough.fabric.description: Your first steps to work with Fabric!
extension.walkthrough.openPortal.title: Create a workspace
extension.walkthrough.openPortal.descrip:
Go to the Fabric Portal to create a new workspace. If you already have a workspace then you can skip this step!
[Go to Fabric Portal](https://app.fabric.microsoft.com/)
extension.walkthrough.openFabricView.des:
You can open the Fabric Explorer in the Side Bar by clicking the Fabric Activity Bar icon.
[Go to Fabric Explorer](command:workbench.view.extension.vscode-fabric_view_workspace)
extension.walkthrough.signIn.title: Sign in to Fabric
extension.walkthrough.signIn.description:
Use the 'Fabric: Sign In' command or sign in through the Fabric Explorer.
[Sign in to Fabric](command:vscode-fabric.signIn)
